name: Fashion Shoe Designer Aura
description:
Wonderful news for all of you fashion divas who are obsessed with designer shoes! Fabulous new shoes designing game - Fashion Shoe Designer Aura High Heel Designer
is here to let you design your unique pumps, sandals or stilettos! Download one of the best “designing games" right away and show everyone what a talented shoes designer you are! Be a real trendsetter and make fabulous fashion shoes with this sensational “fashion game"! Rocker-glam or luxurious elegance,
just pick your style and let your eye-catching creation spread its head-turning effect! -
Features:
- Customize shoes, strappy heels, and sandals with a variety of decorations, diamonds, bows, and straps!
- Select the design for every part of the shoe: Upper, heel, platform...
- Two super fun game modes:
- DREAM SHOES GAME MODE -
- Run your own fashion shoes boutique and design a shoe your customer was looking for!
- DESIGN SHOES GAME MODE -
- Make your own shoes and decorate them just the way you want to!
Shoe design games for girls will let you create all sorts of trendy high heels, pumps, and sandals! Run your own design studio, decorate shoes, and every princess and model on the globe will fall in love with your unique fashionable creations! Your customers will come to your shoe store looking for wedding shoe models, prom platforms, and stiletto heels, so you'll have to dress up the shoes to match their wish!
Every little girl dreams of becoming the most famous fashion stylist when they grow up, and with **Fashion Shoe Designer Aura** they can take a peek into the world of fashion industry and design fashionable high heels! Write your magical story of fashion and give all the princesses their dream designer shoes to have their happy ending and live happily ever after!
Walk, walk fashion baby! Make your footwear stand out in the crowd and make your happy feet walk fashionably on the street! Get a major shoe crush and design the most beautiful "fashion shoes" for your gorgeous models!
Run your fabulous princesses shoe factory and become the most popular high heels creator in the world! “High heel" designer games for girls are taking over the world in 2019!
Download this fantastic **Shoe Maker-High Heel Designer** game and write your unique stylish story with custom footwear!
Designer shoes for women can be timeless black high heels, urban pumps, trendy stilettos, or even flat sandals! Design prom shoes when a prom queen comes to your fashion boutique, or design perfect bridal shoes when a bride comes to look for a perfect pair of glass slippers for her princess wedding! Become the top fashion stylist for star dolls with this 2019 fashion “shoe designer" app!
If you've always dreamed of designing designer heels, and you love to play dress up and makeover games for girls, this awesome 2019 fashion app is all you need! Make your own urban stiletto heels or open-toe pump and decorate them with crystals, spikes, and all sorts of accessories! Create your unique elegant pumps or fancy wedges, and add glitters, studs, and chains! Make your strappy sandals feet perfectly to the feet to form an addictive style for the upcoming season!
Pay attention to the tiniest details, sometimes they can speak the loudest! Pick a peep-toe, a round-toe, stiletto or a pump, decorate with bows, laces, or some other decoration at the heel,
or some other place, and add your signature to your designer heels! Recreate the most iconic pair of shoes or create your unique style, it's completely up to you!
